__e: Uh, I... I really think if we keep doing what we're doing, working hard, making the right choices, and we'll be doing huge things in 10 years.
20 years ago, we did this for the right reasons, and now, you're doing it for money, and you don't even care about the people you hurt.
It means I have to do things that I know aren't right, and I hate it.
